Manx: Trog erriu, trog erriu, O Vanninee chree,
English: Rise up, rise up, O Manx people of heart,

Manx: Trog erriu, trog erriu, nagh caill shiu nyn mree,
English: Rise up, rise up, don’t lose your energy,

Manx: Trog erriu, trog erriu, O Vanninee dooie,
English: Rise up, rise up, O true Manx people,

Manx: Trog erriu, trog erriu, lesh dunnallys cree,
English: Rise up, rise up, with bravery of heart

Manx: Trog erriu, trog erriu, as na bee shiu cha dree.
English: Trog erriu, trog erriu, don’t be so slow.
